Posts.Content: I have been taking Temoxifen for 2 years now and recently i am experiancing the same, crying almost on daily basis. I have had a bad time at work and at first I thought it is linked to that but after weeks of struggling to stop crying I am coming to conclusion that it may be the tablet
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen ..... depression

Posts.Content: Hi Thanks for your reply.I have always used the same brand and it is only recentley that I feel this way.
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen ..... depression
